java/liquibase/database/DerbyConnectionDelegate.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import java.sql.Connection;
00004 import java.sql.SQLException;
00005 import java.sql.Statement;
00006 
00007 public class DerbyConnectionDelegate extends SQLConnectionDelegate {
00008 
00009     public DerbyConnectionDelegate(Connection connection) {
00010         super(connection);
00011     }
00012 
00013 
00014     public void commit() throws SQLException {
00015         super.commit();
00016 
00017         checkPoint();
00018     }
00019 
00020     public void rollback() throws SQLException {
00021         super.rollback();
00022 
00023         checkPoint();
00024     }
00025 
00026     private void checkPoint() throws SQLException {
00027         Statement st = null;
00028         try {
00029             st = createStatement();            
00030             st.execute("CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_CHECKPOINT_DATABASE()");
00031         } finally {
00032             if (st != null) {
00033                 st.close();
00034             }
00035         }
00036     }
00037 }
